mapper.select: SELECT hubo_id AS code, CONCAT(t.upper_sg_name, ' : ', t.lower_sg_name) AS label FROM candidate c, ( SELECT t1.sg_id AS sg_id, t1.sg_type_code AS sg_type_code, t2.sg_name AS upper_sg_name, t1.sg_name AS lower_sg_name FROM election t1, election t2 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.sg_id = t2.sg_id AND t2.sg_type_code = '0' ) t WHERE c.sg_id = t.sg_id AND c.sg_type_code = t.sg_type_code AND c.hubo_id = #{huboId}
